params.mmrIdx: The index of the cached MMR to verify against.
params.payee: The address to send payment to.

params.keccakQueryResponse: The hash of the query response.

params.ipfsHash: The IPFS hash the query should optionally be posted to.
params.refundee: The address refunds should be sent to.
The address refunds should be sent to.

params.hash: `verifiedKeccakResults(keccak256(keccakBlockResponse . keccakAccountResponse . keccakStorageResponse)) == true`          if and only if each of `keccakBlockResponse`, `keccakAccountResponse`, and `keccakStorageResponse` have been verified         on-chain by a ZK proof.

`verifiedPoseidonResults(keccak256(poseidonBlockResponse . poseidonAccountResponse . poseidonStorageResponse)) == true`          if and only if each of `poseidonBlockResponse`, `poseidonAccountResponse`, and `poseidonStorageResponse` have been         verified on-chain by a ZK proof.

params.mmrIdx: The index of the cached MMR to verify against.

areResponsesValid(bytes32,bytes32,bytes3.notice: Verify block, account, and storage data against responses which have already been proven.

collectRefund(bytes32).notice: Trigger refund collection for a query after the deadline has expired.

isKeccakResultValid(bytes32,bytes32,byte.notice: Checks whether an unpacked query response has already been verified.

isPoseidonResultValid(bytes32,bytes32,by.notice: Checks whether an unpacked query response has already been verified.

queries(bytes32).notice: Returns the metadata associated to a query

sendOffchainQuery(bytes32,address,bytes3.notice: Request proof for query with off-chain query data availability.

sendQuery(bytes32,address,bytes).notice: Request proof for query with on-chain query data availability.

verifiedKeccakResults(bytes32).notice: Read the set of verified query responses in Keccak form.

verifiedPoseidonResults(bytes32).notice: Read the set of verified query responses in Poseidon form.
